Review.Titre: Very slow despatch, nothing happening after 2 weeks from ordering
Review.Contenu: Very slow service. Product ordered well before Christmas and after 2 weeks it still wasn’t despatched. Customer service is slow in responding. They said there are some issues in the warehouse but after a week of chasing it, still nothing. All they say is they understand my frustration. That’s not helpful at all as this is a Christmas present. I am very disappointed with the whole service. You should work on better customer service where a solution is found.

Very slow to dispatch. Supposed to be next day dispatch and then 1-2 day delivery. Followed up after 8 days and it still wasn't dispatched. There was a problem in the warehouse, but minimal info given. I ended up cancelling the order

Ordered a week ago, but still not despatched.Contacted customer support but no response.Clearly not able to fulfil orders at this time - AVOID.Edit after receiving response below fromMeater…- my email to customer services from several days ago remains unanswered (interesting that Meater are prioritising responding to Trustpilot reviews over customer service emails 🤔)- tracking information still not available…So I’m not sure I entirely believe the response to be truthful…

Review.Titre: 8 days and order still not dispatched
Review.Contenu: Ordered on 11th Dec and still not dispatched. On ordered it states 1-2 days. Contacted customer service and was told DHL are to blame because they couldn't print labels. Still no update on order on website. Seems like a con to get orders in for stock they don't have.

My meter stopped working contacted customer service because the temperatures were not reading correctly, ambient or internal and after information back-and-forth he finally sent me this message.email. Thom | Senior Customer Happiness Agent (Apption Labs)Nov 30, 2023, 10:30 AM GMTHi Richard,Thanks for getting back to me! Thank you for the information. Unfortunately, these over-temperature events on your probe void the warranty. If you'd like to purchase new probes I'd be happy to send you an invoice for $59.00 total (a 50% saving on the MSRP). If that sounds OK please let me know and I'll get the invoice right over to you! Take care and stay safe and I hope to hear from you soon. Kind regards,ThomCan’t afford spending any more money I got these for a present they were expensive so I guess they don’t stand behind their product when you have a flareup and they make them go bad

Ever since I bought this product, I have trouble setting it up you go on their website and you get computer-generated responses which do not answer your questions and answers generic questions. Then two of my probes broke, and they told me that it was not under warranty even though it's only a couple of months old because they said my grill was too hot and void my warranty, and I could buy two more. This was a very expensive item, and there are others out there that at work just as well if not better do not buy this.

After a maximum of 5 times of use the base unit started to drain the battery and now despite fresh battery and green check light the probe will not charge. The probe is clean with no food left on connecting surfaces.The Bluetooth connection has been somewhat challenging like other reviews😕

Extremely low durability. After only a few uses I pulled the probe out of a piece of meat and the top section came off. Hadnt pulled it hard at all. The max temp is 275 degrees C, this is ridulously low and impractical as from time to time something will happen to make it go over that temp. I   wrote to meater to complain and they asked questions including my login to the app, they then used this info to decline a replacement by saying it had a voided warranty as it had been over temp after stringing me along with a bunch of other questions. Product is entirely impractical to use even when used in reasonable and normal manner. Stick to more robust solutions such as Webber, I replaced the useless meater with another Webber, I had the previous Webber probe for 8 years. Meater is a terrible product terrible warranty.

I bought the 4 pack.  Unfortunately the MEATER doesn’t read/work thru 1/4 inch steel smokers.  This is of no use to me.  For sale cheap.  Respond and we can workOut a deal.  Or MEATER can refund me.  I now us a Vicken temp prob.  It’s nice.

The black tip will fail after a certain amount of time and if you are out of the 2-year warranty they will try and charge you £55 for a new probe. I have only used it 5 or 6 times in my home oven and it has already broken. I find this disappointing and is likely a common issue. Its a shame they only backup their product for 2 years and wont offer a greater discount when the product goes wrong.

Received this as a Christmas gift in 2022 and it has never worked.  I have been speaking with customer service for 6+ months, completing all of the troubleshooting tasks requested.  Nothing has worked.  I have been asked for a receipt on numerous occasions, but I have advised on each occasion that this was a gift and I do not have the receipt.  It is now considered as "resolved" and the email case closed when I was offered a 10% discount off a future purchase.  This is absolutely ridiculous.  It has never worked.  It should be replaced.  I wouldn't even mind sending the Meater Plus in to be tested by experts, but nothing.  My son in law's £20 thermometer works over mine!

Review.Titre: Do not buy from this company
Review.Contenu: Do not buy from this company. I purchased a MEATER plus in January, used a few times  and it came apart then stopped working. I tried to get some help with this issue and had initial bot reply like all the other people on here, then nothing .Tried several times to contact MEATER with no response whatsoever, joke company, luckily bought through Amazon and they have kindly agreed to give me a refund, otherwise £110 would have been wasted on an item not fit for purpose .

Review.Titre: The app is not supported any more for…
Review.Contenu: The app is not supported any more for my mobile so $199 wasted. other issues; it demands I turn on location, why does it need gps location? Blutooth sure, that's ok but location?I tried to pick the app from an old phone that still works but it does not show up anywhere. Somehow the app is hidden, Why? All other apps I can find.So an odd business that uses your location, hides itself in the mobile and cant be updated.

Review.Titre: Avoid this company at all costs
Review.Contenu: A great item when it works. If yours dies like mine did after 4 uses, then expect zero customer service from MEATER. Read all the poor reviews here and it’s one universal complaint- they just do not respond to email support - which is a real problem given they only have that as an option.Awful company - look elsewhere

We have great wifi and bluetooth. LOST CONNECTION anytime you close the oven door or the grill cover.  I put the charging box and phone as close to the probe as possible without cooking the phone or the box. Save your money and all the frustration. This was a gift from our son.  This occurs on both apple and android phones.

Review.Titre: When it works great ; otherwise avoid …
Review.Contenu: When it works great !Mine now does random things - alarm goes off for over temperature when it isn’t . Last time I used it the cooking estimate time was 30 minutes ( which from experience is correct ) . At the 25 minute point it said 1 hour ! - meat would have been inedible if I had done that .Worst of all support ranges from poor to non existent. Emails go unresponded too frequently . So much so that I don’t use the MEATER probe anymore .Manual probe MUCH more reliable and requires no “ technical support “ .

Review.Titre: Surgical precision BBQing, VERY DISAPPOINTING STURDINESS
Review.Contenu: The timing and cook temperature was spot on! The result with the rotisserie chicken was THE juiciest chicken I've EVER tasted. There's NO WAY you can come close to this level of perfect cooking without the MEATER probes.A MUST for any serious BBQer!------------------------------------MY REVIEW UPDATE....While the temperature accuracy is impressive, the sturdiness of the probes is below average. On the third cook (rotisserie chicken), cook temperature of 260F, once the cook was done I pulled out the probe and the ancient temperature bit (the black numbered side of the probe) detached from the rest of the probe. Since I've only owned the MEATER block for only three weeks, it doesn't bode well for long term use, considering the original cost of the item. After contacting APPTION LABS, they have issued a ticket but have yet to address the issue. So for these reasons, I will now NOT recommend the MEATER probes. There are now other brands of there, all of which would be a consideration.

Review.Titre: I join the many other meater customers…
Review.Contenu: I join the many other meater customers who have found the product to be useless for grilling. The ambient temps of a basic gas fired barbecue trigger the alerts warning of pending damage to the sensors. Clearly, the maximum temperature design point was way to low. So, don’t waste your money. Just get a regular digital meat thermometer and probe your food on the grill from time to time.

Review.Titre: Meater is great in theory but lacking…
Review.Contenu: Meater is great in theory but lacking when grilling over an open flame.There is advertisements that show cooking over open flames but the ambient temp errors out and the meater stops working at 525 and locks up the app.Can't stray far with phone or charging box it will loose its connection.I have email from support indicating to use reverse sear method with the meaterThe company will not reimburse me for my worthless product

Review.Titre: Device broke in a few months
Review.Contenu: Device broke in a few months. Service team have said too bad, buy a new one and claim the temperature has been exceeded.The product wasn't used outside the guidelines, this has been assumed by you based on erroneous data. I will not be purchasing another product.

Purchased a month ago - nothing has arrived and no follow up. Made enquiries after one week, as suggested on the website. Got an automated response on how to use my product - which I don’t have. Messaged you on Facebook and got another automated response. All I want to know is when my product will arriveI can't seem to reply so updating with the information to get a response. Order name: Jennifer McDowell

Awful accuracy, annoyingly temperamental losing connection often, overpriced compared to other better solutions.Avoid, save your money.Here we go…… trustpilot and a company trying to bully a non 5 star review off the platform. Who knew only top rated opinions count on here?!I have responded so let’s see how long it takes for this to be unfairly removed.

Shocking customer service, my Meater thermometer just stopped connecting one day, i followed all the steps that had been advised and then reached out, a week or so later a reply, then...Nothing! another week or so later an email requesting images and clarity on a couple of things, email sent. now, nothing! I've had an ongoing, unresolved issue now for months that still hasn't been fully acknowledged

Like many others here, my meater stopped working less than a year after purchasing. I have been engaged in a back and forth with the support team where after each email they disappear for two weeks. Summer season is quickly passing by and I’ve had to purchase an alternate cheaper thermometer but am still hoping for a replacement if the support team can follow through. Posting here as I see some responses from company reps so maybe this post will move them along.

Review.Titre: They Do not stand by their warranty
Review.Contenu: They Do not stand by their warranty. Here’s another frustrating part (Connection Lost……worked great for 3 months)file:///var/mobile/Library/SMS/Attachments/00/00/CE134812-0368-4416-A9F3-65DB6A1A9CBB/Screenshot%202021-09-26%20at%204.14.43%20PM.jpeg

Review.Titre: I placed an order for oven mitts and a…
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for oven mitts and a second thermometer. Order charged my bank the merchant is paid they shipped my items via FedEx and they say they were to be delivered FedEx stated they got an email from the shipper requesting the items be returned to them. So I emailed Meater and get a stupid return that my product is out for delivery they never even looked into the issue now I’m out of 125.00 or so and a product worst damn company I have ever purchased from

Had high hopes but the first try was useless. Lost connection after 2 minutes so pulled from the oven and reset it - connected. Back in the oven but then no updating of the data. No proper temperatures, only time since started. When food is in the oven it is not the best time to try resetting devices. Restarted my phone and surprisingly got connection but the new temperatures remained static and lost the time from start. I think I have wasted my money on this.

Customer service poor. Ordered this product in November and still waiting for this to arrive. The only solution offered was they could try to ship a similar product - not the one I originally ordered but it probably won’t get here for Christmas. No refund, no discount “happiness agent” didn’t make this customer  happy. I will be sharing this experience with everyone. Including my 23k followers on Tik tok

Run by thieves. Huge scam. Customer Service is a joke. I wanted to return a product - had to go through PayPal & they finally replied. Arranged collection of the product (have proof) & still not received my refund. I've chased them numerous times & heard nothing. I definitely wouldn't recommend them. Avoid at all costs (otherwise it will no doubt cost you!)Because there is no way of replying to your reply - pls see my one of many ticket numbers 172317

I ordered a Meater 4 probe block ( roughly $275) for a  Christmas gift but I received a single probe (roughly $65). I box was delivered without any paperwork, no packing list (I think they shipped me someone else's order). I went to their support website but there is no way to correct a mis-shipment or to contact anyone to get this corrected. I sent an Email but no one replies. I tried calling their office in California and no one answers, just recorded messages saying to use their web support (that has proven to be worthless). I feel like they have stolen my money. VERY BAD accountability and recourse for the customer.

Review.Titre: The worst company I have ever dealt…
Review.Contenu: The worst company I have ever dealt with. I purchased a MEATER Plus last September. Since 3 months in, if I listen to the cooking times suggested by the probe it will overcook/burn food. I reached out to MEATER, however they were adamant this was a user error. A couple months later, the probe now refuses to connect to the hub even when they are within 0.5m of each other. Once again I reached out to MEATER, who have decided this time to shut down my raised case without any contact with myself. I would strongly advise to purchase another product, I have had nothing but trouble with mine.

Review.Titre: After requesting a copy of App
Review.Contenu: After requesting a copy of the version of the app that worked in 2022, they said Quote; “you would have to upgrade your phone, meaning you would have to buy a new phone that has the capability to use the app”My reply; “So I paid $199 for a meater plus, then not longafter you changed the download so that the app no longer works on my phoneand you are saying I should spend more cash to buy a new phone.”They would not offer the older version of the app so I could keep using after I rebooted the mobile. I see on Amazon and AliExpress same thing for a ¼ the cost and their apps work fine. Will see if consumer affairs can help as seems a breach of the Consumer Guarantees Act.  There is supposed to be a 2 year warranty, at least the do respond but I’m out $200 plus $50 to buy a replacement from other company.

Review.Titre: My 74 year old husband lasts longer!!!!!!!!!
Review.Contenu: Have been trying to contact meater about this defective product for multiple weeks now, received automated response, replied with requested photos, sent another message after a week of no response and have yet to hear back. Product lasted a couple months and no longer works like with many other reviewers..

Review.Titre: This device is worse than useless
Review.Contenu: This device is worse than useless. A, waste of money. It consistently undercooked the meat. It always has some problem with either the connection or the battery or the software.I would NOT recommend it. Buy a simple analogue meat thermometer.

As is the case with many other reviews, I am greatly dissapointed in the lack of customer service with Meater. I opened up a ticket with Meater online regarding my SECOND unit that failed.  I did get one Bot generated response and I performed all of the tasks including pictures and promptly sent them the information. That was late April.  I have followed up with 2-3 emails but Meater simply will not respond at all.  In these days of social media, I find it astonishing that this company's customer  support is so lacking.  Also, I always find it troubling when there is no phone number to make actual person to person contact.  Of note, I bought a different unit called "TempSpike" that is the same set up and so far works just fine AND is less expensive. Still, I would really like to salvage the Meater probes I have so I have functioning units and not just big fat toothpicks.
Your equipment is 100% but why ooooohhhhh why can’t you make a block out of cherry wood then I would by 1 straight away come on meter make cherry block

I ordered the meater block and this failed to get to me VIA delivery, I have contacted MEATER 3 times to get this resolved and no one has contacted me back, seems to be a lack of empathy as the blame gets put straight onto the courier, I understand that the courier has not managed to deliver the item however the company providing the product should be assisting customers and putting their minds at ease! Not only am I without what I ordered I am also the full amount of the item down. No mention of a refund.Would never order this product.

Initially my thermometer worked great. Less than 6 months and it came apart. I contacted Meater and got a prompt reply. After emailing back and forth I was told I couldn't get it replaced under warranty because I couldn't provide proof of purchase.(I received it as a gift). I was told i could purchase another probe.I told the customer service person I was disappointed in the quality of the product considering the price. After that I never heard back. I got the proof of purchase information from the person I received the gift from and forwarded it them and still have no response. I even opened another case with all the information they requested and still no answers. Case# 248073, 248478.

Unfortunately my experience with the meater probe is the same as all the other comments, lose connection as soon as the oven door is closed, I get the message to move the probe closer , my phone would melt in the oven as the phone is next to the oven..I did leave a review with the meater directly..

Review.Titre: Further to the review below. I’ve now been contacted by MEATER saying they will provide a replacement which I look forward to receiving. The MEATER…only lasted for 18 'cooks'
Review.Contenu: The MEATER, when it works is excellent…BUT, after only 18 times I’ve used it, it stopped connecting to my phone or I pad…I contacted ‘Support' who suggested that it needed properly cleaned, and I took all the appropriate actions, several times, but to no avail. Eventually, I was asked to provide proof of purchase so they could replace it… BUT… that was the last I’ve heard…so far… two weeks have passed and I’ve contacted 'Support' a further two times… all I’ve been told is that they need to escalate the matter to the management.This is an expensive piece of equipment and I expect it to last longer than 18 'cooks' and also that they should respond quicker when it fails. Come on MEATER… don’t let your customers down please

Review.Titre: If I could give 0 stars I would
Review.Contenu: If I could give 0 stars I would. The absolute worst customer service with no reply.I order 2 x meaters at $200 each on January 31, 2022. Advertised as delivery within 2 days in Australia. It has now been over 3 weeks and after 5 emails and a Facebook post on Meaters page, I still have not heard anything from them.

Review.Titre: terrible support - will be contacting consumer affairs
Review.Contenu: Tried for over a month to get my meater+ replaced as it was faulty and still under warranty. lodged multiple email s and no response in over a month of trying from meater+ - will follow this up with consumer law.Update on this - meater now contacted me and resolved the issue. Thanks for getting through.

Review.Titre: Probe quality is poor, only exceeded by the god awful Meator support. Poor equipment quality but better than their service
Review.Contenu: Had the meater block bought for me for xmas 2021. Initially 1 of 4 probes rarely connected, and when it did connect, it dropped off frequently/for long periods of time, so it was/is essentially useless. Now... as of Mar 12, another probe will not monitor internal temps.... it stays at 68F perpetually. I did the Meator test process in hot/cold water but no change to the temp.... 68F. Have sent Meator support 2 emails, and all I've got back is .... "experiencing delays, thx for your patience". This device was not cheap, but a serious quality issue, now backed up by atrocious service. And looking at the warranty info, IF they get back to me, it's my warranty responsibility/cost to get the equipment delivered to them as no mention of local service providers.Disgraceful.

Review.Titre: We can’t get any response except an…
Review.Contenu: We can’t get any response except an automated trouble shooting bot.  Then I get an email that our ticket was closed.  No real person.  No real customer service at all.  The product worked just a few times, then stopped staying connected to our phones during cooking.  Totally not worth it!

Received as gift, so can not return so stuck with it.  Neat gadget but my Weber is twice the unit.When the inside of grill is to hot..  big butt red screen...  WARNING WARNING.... have to pull it or break it.  Need to over cook per probe thermometer is just no accurate.   Application is hard to use need to set up cloud account to use.  Always buzzing telling you something that is not important.

I've had my Meater for a week now. It hasn't worked since day no. 1!! 7 days later the Block still isn't charged!! And yes, I've removed the tabs from the batteries and even changed the batteries!! The only "customer support" I've received is to go through all the problem solving on their website none of which helped. I've sent 3 emails as there is no phone number. I'm so disappointed, as this item had good reviews on YouTube and they are very expensive!! This company shouldn't be in business. Does anybody have any suggestions? I'm wondering about Consumer Affairs or Choice Magazine. Word needs to get out there so others don't make the sane mistake.

Review.Titre: Horrible service for a not reliable product
Review.Contenu: Received a thermometer as a gift. Used only a hand full of times and within those times maybe half the time did it actually work. Finally went to use it and it just stopped working completely. Still had warranty so I reached out to meater. 3 times. Over the course of several weeks. Never heard anything back. Still haven’t. And now I’m sitting here with an expensive paper weight and nothing to do about it. Could have been a great product if they got their quality control and customer service up a little.

Horrible customer service, purchased as a present for my dad for Christmas on 13th of December. Still hasn't arrived so I emailed their support team which is where they are supposedly meant to sort out any issue. I was told they will work to sort out my ticket but theres a queue and if I replied to their email that i would get sent too the back of it. It's been a month and they haven't reached my ticket. Personally worst online shopping experience ever will be looking to take action against them not even excited about receiving the product anymore and just want my money back as I have reason to believe its just a cheap inferior product which has been rebranded and marked up.

Review.Titre: Failed right before one year warranty
Review.Contenu: Failed right before one year warranty. Customer service is a ticket based online system and has been unresponsive for a few weeks. Afraid warranty will be up before anyone ever gets around to replying!

I got this product as a present for Xmas from my wife.  We were both excited as we had watched a cooking show that uses this.  While it is ok for smoking meat or cooking indoors it is totally useless for grilling.  Most people know that wood, charcoal, and even gas grills cook at well over the 575 degree limit of the product.  My gas grill cooks at 700 degrees.  My wife pointed out that she often cooks roasts in the oven that start at 575 degrees and later get reduced.  This product probably works well for anyone cooking below 500 degrees but for over that it will likely not work (gets high heat alert) or break the probe.

Terrible service - stay away…..Initially worked fine then at the beginning of a cook the probe disconnected and despite numerous efforts will no longer connect. I have been contacting Meater since November who refuse to replace the probe despite being under warranty. Incredibly poor service.

Only used it twice. First time the ambient sensor was about 30degC out. Contacted support and they sent me an enormous email with all sorts of analytical data on it.Second time was yesterday. Cooking a small beef joint at 160dgC for ~ 55 mins. In that time my mechanical temp indicator in the oven said, as expected 160degC. The Meater probe said 141degC consistently.On completion of cooking, the Meater probe said 41degC. I used my old digital device to test the joint. I tried it in various places on the joint and it consistently returned temperatures of around 60 - 62degC. The probe still said 41degC.!!!!!My opinion is it is rubbish. I have contacted support with these figures, but still to get a reply.My preference is a refund, I have no confidence in the thing at all.

Ordered the ‘Block’ on 31 January- have enquires 3 times as to progress of order and just get the ridiculous automated reply - for a $450 purchase that I have not received and am unable to enquire about this is the WORST customer service EVER!I want my money back NOWUPDATE: STILL NO RESOLUTION -Still no refund or receipt of product. Put in dispute with my credit card and Meater apparently suggested that it was sent even though I have emails from them showing it was NOT ….I WANT A REFUND OF MY MONEY WHICH YOU HAVE HAD SINCE JANUARY- Shame on you.

Do not order direct. When something goes wrong with delivery the email address you are given to tell them about it is a no reply address that gives an automated response telling you to go to their website. When go to their website, they tell you to contact the courier. The courier tells you to contact the seller. It's a jolly circus and I may as well have just thrown £250 out the window.

Review.Titre: NO TRACKING AND NO CUSTOMER SERVICE
Review.Contenu: I ordered 4 Meaters for Christmas presents and was sent tracking information showing the label was created on 12/1 but there was never a package shipped out and I have not received anything. There is NO CUSTOMER SERVICE NUMBER TO CALL so I have no way to get in touch with them. The support email address is not a real email address, I got an automatic response saying that my email was not delivered because the inbox doesn't accept messages. So, I have no Christmas presents and no one to contact about it.

I have been trying to get a response from Meater for 2-weeks now. My experience like most is I received the instant company BOT response but nothing since. I also experience the connectivity and cook info drop-out issues but have managed to improve these somewhat. My primary issue is I have damaged two of my probes during a cook on 22.04.23. This may be my fault if I over-heated the probes during the reverse sear but if so, I just need to know this, and how I can replace the probes to keep BBQ-ing with them. Lets face it, the device is a bit of a gizmo and not necessary for successful BBQ-ing but we all like to use it and it can impress people with the results. As were a group of my friends who attended this BBQ but they saw the damage to the probes and are aware of, and not impressed by my struggles to resolve this with Meater. So at present, 1 disgruntled customer and 5 dubious potential customers. Given the cost, the service is shocking.

Review.Titre: Not a good product and dreadful customer service.
Review.Contenu: The MEATER probe works at up to 10m BUT when you put it in the oven or air fryer it only works at a distance of about 1m.  My MEATER broke over 2 months ago and this company is a nightmare to try and contact and get a response from.  They have finally sent me a replacement, but only the probe, when I had returned the entire unit to them.  Have received no response when I emailed them to try and sort out. Worst customer service of any company I have had to deal with.

Awful customer service that doesn't understand consumer rights.I purchased a Meater+ direct in November 21. It has consistently given to high a reading, saying temperature has been reached when it has not.After experiencing undercooked chicken 4 times I followed the procedure on their support page which confirmed the issue. I submitted a support ticket with the test findings. Now they want me to retest, and so it goes round in circles.I have now had to open a PayPal dispute to try and reclaim my money.Seriously, stay away, they are blindingly obvious in their attempts to dodge their responsibilities in warranty.

Hugely disappointed in the customer service. The second time i used mine it would connect. I went through all their support suggestions and still doesn't work. After 10 days I have still not received a response from their customer service site

Review.Titre: Got the meater + as a gift from my…
Review.Contenu: Got the meater + as a gift from my employer they gave a bunch out. Unfortunately it's garbage keeps disconnecting. Won't pair anymore. Had phone charger and probe within a foot of each other still wouldn't work. So glad I didn't pay for it. Feel bad for my company though. Seems I'm not the only one that said screw it and just going back to a regular thermometer. Looks nice but that's about it.Thanks for the reply but already through it away. Everything was within 2 feet of each other. As soon as you close lid looses signal. More of a hassle using than just cooking and sticking a thermometer in it.

Review.Titre: There is literally no customer support
Review.Contenu: There is literally no customer support. There isn't a number to call, or a human to reach. This $300 piece of crap worked great - twice. Now it lost the internet connection-no big deal,and is stuck in pairing mode.I want a refund.

I'm trying to get a refund for this product since days! Already, the fact that you can't get a return label easily on their website is absurd. I had to filled up a return request online, then waited for an automated response telling me they will get back to me, then a guy ask me if he can help me with the product (even though I filled up a form and he perfectly knows I want a return), then they asked me for a picture of the product (W*F?) and now they are saying they need to escalate my request to a senior team and will get back to me ! Seriously ? How many emails and people is it gonna take to send me a freaking return label ? This is a joke !

Review.Titre: Parcel wasn't delivered, no options for redelivery
Review.Contenu: Parcel wasn't delivered by DPD. They 'missed me' for delivery even though I was home and I have a concierge in the building.I contacted both Meater and DPD to arrange re-delivery but there were no suitable options:(1) Meater customer support attributed responsibility to DPD and wouldn't offer a solution for redelivery within a week.(2) DPD won't re-deliver the product and would place the responsibility with Meater. Their only option is to pick it up from a specific post office, which is unsuitable because:2.1 Doesn't have appropriate opening times given that I have a full-time job2.2 It's close to home but not to the place where I work (and where I actually am Mon-Fri during business hours, which is when the post office opens)Terrible service

Review.Titre: Our product keeps dropping signal in…
Review.Contenu: Our product keeps dropping signal in spite of a strong internet connection. Zero customer service. I have been trying to return them since Christmas. After several emails / text messages I get a reply that they have high demand and it may take some time for someone to contact me. Meanwhile the return is 30 days from date of purchase yet you can’t get in touch with anyone for weeks and longer as I am still waiting, this was also a Christmas gift. They also say you can only return if it’s unopened and unused. How do you know it doesn’t work if you haven’t opened it ?  Do not purchase this product as the company does not stand behind it if there is a problem. I hope I can help save others from wasting a lot of money on a faulty product. Shame on meater for such poor customer service.

Review.Titre: no response from Meater, they don't care
Review.Contenu: Purchased a Meater plus, has always struggled to connect, now will not connect at all, tried to contact Meater, you can't call them, emailed 4 times, no response, they just don't care

So after almost a month and apparently some prompting from a bad review from me. The customer support came back and said restart the probe and make sure it is charged. The same as it says on the website….. not helpful MEATER .

Now this one stays on for 10 mins then just decides to go to sleep and cuts out. Batteries are brand new.Im so disappointed in this as it was so expensive for the block. And as previous reviews state there is practically 0 customer service. I had to wait over 3 months to get someone to contact me.Honestly an absolute peice of **** and the whole service / experience ruins every time i try to cook on the bbq.

Review.Titre: So So dissappointed with product and robot only customer service
Review.Contenu: I purchased Meater+wireless meat thermomter-long range on Amazon. Upon my first use I set the temp at 125 F internal for a joint of beef. When the reading reached ready i.e 125 the meat was hugely over cooked. To check I tested with another thermometer which read 142 F so clealy the MEATER+ was not calibrated correctly and as a result I had a grossly over cooked joint of meat and a faulty product. I followed very carefully all the instructions and I am a very experienced cook. I made contact directly with MEATER + in the USA and all I got was a robot response no human contact whatsoever and my issue was never resolved. Unfortnutely at the same time my wife's father passed away and we lost important time and the ability to return via Amazon within the 30 day time frame. We tried to resolve the issue with Amazon but once again we were in the robotic world that Meater+ lives in. It is abosolutley unaccceptable that a company makes itself non contactable to answer and respond to very professional questions and in this case a legitimate complaint. Clearly a huge risk if one buys this product.
Ordered 3 weeks ago, nothing received yet. Contacted customer support twice already, no reaction. Feels like a scam.

I am disgusted by the service from Meater - we have a faulty unit which has never worked properly.  I contacted Meater early this year (Support Ticket ID 243972).  All started well with the emails going back and forth and me being asked to perform various tests on the unit which all concluded there was a problem with the temperature.  When the Customer Support had exhausted all other options he advised that the matter would need to be escalated to management.  That’s where the customer support stops.  Despite chasing up with him (Levi) several times as to where it’s at after hearing nothing for over a week, he hasn’t bothered answering my emails at all so I generated a new contact.  No answer from that either.  Clearly our unit is faulty and no one wants to know about it.  Our unit is in brand new condition, having only been used a handful of times and it’s never worked - what is going on with your supposed 2 year warranty????  Beware buying from this company, they are happy to take your money but just don’t want to know when there’s an issue.

Review.Titre: Useless device and appalling customer service...
Review.Contenu: Device not working, indicates unrealistically low temperatures and suggests excessive cooking times which have ruined a few nice cuts of meat. Reached out to the customer service multiple times a few months ago, no response for quite some time and when they finally replied (after chasing them for days on facebook and twitter), no solution was offered. Gave up on it and left it in a cupboard until a friend bought one recently and was very happy. We compared the 2 devices and ours indicated 25 extra mins of cooking time (same cut, same conditions with the 2 probes to compare), confirming the device is faulty. Useless device and appalling customer service...Serial number: 21C08ACM1M003284Order number: UK86648161037SP- - -Edit further to Meater response on TrustpilorIndeed, I have re-opened a case yesterday given that the 2 previous ones from almost a year ago did not bring a satisfactory outcome.Thanks for assuming I'm an idiot and explaining that a thinner part of a meat cut will cook faster than a thicker part. (We obviously compared what's comparable, placing the probes at the center of the same cut). Hopefully this time the customer service can replace the device, in which case I'll update the review with I hope a higher mark.

Review.Titre: Very very poor customer service - no response since 17 days
Review.Contenu: I am so disappointed with the customer support. On 09.06.23 I ordered per accident (I wanted to wait till I can talk to my husband about it). Immediately I tried to cancel the order. The “button” function wasn’t working. It said that I have to try later again or get in touch with the customer support. I did both and never got a response. I tried to cancel it till 12.06.23 - then I got a shipping confirmation. I wrote countless e- Mails and tried to reach out multiple times on the “contact form”. It was delivered by 13.06.23. Till today I tried to get in touch with them on a daily basis. I want to return the delivery. However, I am not willing to pay the costs. It’s been 17 days that I didn’t get any response on my E-Mails or messages on the contact form. It is really a shame, I heard that the products are good. But something like this never happened to me before. The took the money immediately and didn’t give me any option to cancel my order. Very very poor customer service.

Review.Contenu: Ordered and pay on December 5 for Quebec Canada. Still not shipped even if they give me a UPS tracking #Poor service- no feedbak - not recommended

Review.Titre: Received defective product, Meater refuses to uphold their own warranty
Review.Contenu: Since I have bought the probe, it has been reading the wrong internal and ambient temperature. On top of this, while using it, the probe itself completely fell apart. It seems very clear given my experience that I received a defective product. I reached out to Meater’s support team to see if they would uphold their warranty and of course, they have not. They said that I have exceeded the maximum temperature on the probe which caused it to break which is not true since the temperature that the probe has been reading has been inaccurate since day one. I have double checked the temperatures with another probe and it has been way off. Additionally, Meater support has said that I am outside of the one year warranty period.. which I am not. I have NOT had this probe for longer than a year. A real disappointment but I am not surprised given other customer’s experiences. They offered to send me a replacement probe at my own cost but given my experience with their customer support and fake warranty offered, I will likely be using another product and I do not want to send this company anymore of my money since they have no intent of fulfilling their own warranty. If you’re looking for a wireless probe, please do yourself a favor and find another company that actually cares about its consumers instead of this one.

Update:  7/15/2022.  I did get a response today, and an authorization to return for an exchange.  I do appreciate that.  I understand in today's world, things are hectic.  My only suggestion to Meater is to at least communicate to customers that you are working on it, and it may take X number of days, or even X number of weeks before you may hear back.  I'm good with that.  What I don't like is feeling ignored and hopeless.  Thank you for your help, and I'm hoping the replacement is as good as I hear it is.Received my Meater for a Father's Day gift, and it would not connect.  I tried every trouble shooting article on Meaters website to no avail.  I did send in a customer service request email.  2 days later, I received an email back with a cut and paste from their website of all the things I've already done.Since then, I responded, left 5 different emails stating I still have issues, and not even a response.I have since been able to use it twice, but that requires me to unpair the meater, turn off my Bluetooth, take out the probe from the block, open the app, turn on Bluetooth and wait for it to once again pair to my device.  There has to be an easier way, but I will never know as my questions are ignored by Meater.I want to be able to like this thermometer, I like the premise behind it, but with ZERO customer support, I'm not sure it's worth the money.

Meater stopped working, I followed all troubleshooting directions on their site before getting in touch. There followed endless questions, tests, photos sent, further questions, more photos. Now referred to senior team. Just deal with your customer..stop hedging and prevaricating and wasting time. What a customer fail!Update 5 March 2023. I’ve been sent a replacement probe, but it’s the charging unit that’s at fault. Also what I’ve been sent is a regular Meater when my faulty item is the more expensive Meater Plus. Again, I’m without the item I paid for and have experienced utterly haphazard customer service. This is just a dreadful way to respond to a faulty item. Very disappointing, I’ll be taking further action.Further Update 8th March. Replacement probe will not communicate with original base unit - Meater just replaced probe, not base unit. They now want me to book a service call with them. I have already gone through the issues many times. It is beyond frustrating to have this protracted process to sort out a problem where replacement of full unit is required.Update 17 March 2023 It’s taken 34 communications to finally get to the point where I MIGHT have a replacement Meater on the way to replace my 8 month old Meater which just stopped working. To be fair, Daniel, who took on the case about 3 weeks ago, has tried to get me a new meater quickly and I got a complimentary pair of gloves about a week ago, but the Meater itself is still a no show. It’s not a stock issue, it’s a systems and operations issue, made worse by Meater’s refusal to act promptly and appropriately  to deal with the initial issue. Would I buy a Meater again? Not unless there was a very evident improvement in their after sales service, not withstanding Daniels valiant attempts..their technology and processes hampered him in sorting this out

Review.Titre: Worked well for the first 6 months and…
Review.Contenu: Worked well for the first 6 months and the past couple of cooks nothing but connection issues

MEATER Failed on the big dayI am giving the MEATER + one star as when I needed it on Christmas day it failed badly and I had to resort to using another meat probe. Good PointsWhen it works its very good. Been using for 3 months in 3 different ovens. You get to find out how good the ovens are or not. You see what temperature the oven actually reaches and the temperature fluctuation. Everything I have cooked with, mainly meat roasts and fish have come out perfect every time in each of the different ovens, that is a big plus for me.Bad Points10th time using the MEATER; Cooking Christmas dinner; a Four Bird roast, around cooking halfway  it failed to connect.  I tried many times to reconnect but it would not. And as of now it will not connect. A product costing £100 used 10 times over 3 months failing is poor. It has always been hand washed, the probe always in the meat at the required notch, and the battery is full, tested with green light confirming on base station.Other IssuesSome of my cooks that are saved have wrong temperatures for the peak and target, they are way off, and I can see no logical reason for the error; one says Peak 58C and Target 77C which is mathematically impossible. All the Peak temperatures are incorrect. They have a serious software issue. MEATER claim the probe is water resistant with this in mind I have always avoided getting wet when cleaning and I dry the probe immediately. However, I feel this is unrealistic and that the probe should have been made waterproof. MEATER claim the plus has a range of 50 meters. I seriously doubt this claim, in the real world through walls. Marketing Emails: Be prepared for a lot of them! You can unsubscribe which is what I did, but it was ridiculous the amount I was getting, around every other day. Also, the app has offers most of the time: "free oven mitt" is usually there, again annoying, they would be better spending time improving the app rather than aggressive marketing.I would not recommend you buy this product as it is not reliable.UPDATE JAN 19th 2023I reinstalled the app and the MEATER+ worked again. However, this lasted three times before it failed again.
Times are way off. Shocking for something so expensive

Review.Titre: Disappointed with this product and Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I have been very disappointed with the MEATER+ product and the service received throughout my transaction with MEATER. To be explicit, I have just recently received a part refund (my outlay minus postage and a 15% re-stocking fee). However it was only after a repeated and concerted effort to underscore my concerns about this product in several follow up emails.In short, if you plan to use this product in a baking tray in your oven I would caution you about the product's efficacy. The material of the tray and for that matter, ovens in general are, in my opinion, crucial as to whether it is likely to work or not. Many people use a tray to keep a moist and uniform environment to roast the meat. The MEATER site lists several ovens or roasting devices which they say are compatible but don't specifically warn you about the use of a roasting tray. I note that there are several people who have had connectivity issues between the probe and the repeater even in the approved devices. So I simply say that the problem is likely to be part of a phenomena known as the "Faraday Effect". This is what I said to the MEATER Customer Service people in my initial communication of complaint of which there were several frustrating follow ups."HiI have purchased a new Meater+ for my partner's birthday. We've also downloaded the latest update to the Android app. Batteries are fresh. Probe fully charged as per instructions etc etc.The issue is that the probe is losing connectivity with the Repeater Unit when it's place in a FULLY enclosed metal baking tray. I've isolated the variables involved in placing the probe out of the oven, in the oven on its own in the tray etc etc etc.... I've observed all the max distances between the various components. It functions OK in the oven without the metal dish.I'm a physicist and can understand why there's little or no signal with a tray involved. Effectively the metal dish acts as Faraday Cage. For a simple understanding of this phenomena - see here in case your techos are unaware of this Look up Faraday Cage on Wiki or some such]. This phenomena is used in every day situations in commerce and industry to shield devices from stray or aberrant electro-magnetic (EM) radiation.Thus ... the low power electro-magnetic (EM) energy from the probe is absorbed by the metal shell of the tray. In addition, you must appreciate that the probe is also place in a hostile environment in terms of the material ovens are made of. That is, they are also a Faraday Cage. The glass door of the oven may be the only relief available for transmission.Surely this is a major design flaw. Many people use a metal tray to maintain a consistent environment to cook the meat. It maintains moisture in the meat, speeds cooking and keeps the oven walls much cleaner.Clearly we could change the cookware etc and experiment with RF (radio- frequency) transparent materials etc. But this is both expensive and has an uncertain outcome. Even some porcelain and clay cookware have metal oxides in them which interferes with RF transmission."Clearly the ordinary individual does not know how RF opaque their oven is and some are more opaque than others due to their construction. Thickness of the metal used and how much surrounds the tray is at issue. I think the CONCEPT is a good idea but the execution is problematic. I simply sound this out as a warning to those considering buying this device and I think this is a fair and reasonable undertaking so you don't waste your time and money and end up with a disappointed recipient of your kind thoughts if it's a gift for them.
Absolute rubbish customer service, they take the £ & run, don't buy!

Got the first meater probe which was faulty due the the ambient temperature sensor being damaged on arrival.I followed the process of contacting support and I was very disappointed with the response time. Took them two weeks to respond and it only happened after I messaged them on Facebook. This is not good enough for such a premium product.However, they replaced my probe and now the product is working great. Good range and good data. However still not very confident with the ambient temperature sensor.

Review.Titre: Awsome new tool in the Barbecue arsenal..The directions in box are missing the…
Review.Contenu: The directions in box are missing the part of take the MEATER out of the charger first then open the app. Had to go online for directions. Using the MEATER is Awsome very easy after getting set up going to love it for a long time to come.

Great wireless thermometer but needs improvement. The app needs a lot of work. Connectivity issues to meater cloud, obnoxious alerts that you can't cancel or change. Also, when the probe gets dirty it won't charge. I understand the dilemma, but you are in a grilling and smoking environment, the probe is going to get dirty!

I've been using a handheld digital thermometer for several years to test the internal temperatures of food.  I was excited by the remote sensing offered by Meater.  I chose the standard Meater as a 10 m range would be plenty.  It's a great product and gives perfect results each time.  Unfortunately, the range is nowhere near 10 m in practice.  With the probe inside the closed barbie or oven, the range might be 3-4 m - and it seems to get worse as the cook progresses. A friend bought the Meater+ at the same time and she is having much better success. Save yourself the grief and go straight to the Meater+

Review.Titre: I don’t dislike . Just way over priced
Review.Contenu: I don’t dislike it just cost way to much . My 25.00 one for Menards does same only real difference is other one has cable but doesn’t matter set base on grill right beside yours . As mentioned it was a gift.

Review.Titre: My wife bought me Meater for my…
Review.Contenu: My wife bought me Meater for my birthday, but after some discussion we decided it wasn’t right for me. We were approved for return by the company and packaged it up with all the paperwork and sent it back. After one month we don’t have our money returned and Meater is not returning my emails. Be very careful of this company. Sure you get your product but don’t try to return it.Coincidentally I just received my refund. Thank you Meater.Kurt Kubitz
Still can't connect 4 hours after getting meater plus. Garbage instructions. Proba ly an android 13 issue but website is of no help.

Review.Titre: Gives one a good temp but does not work as a guide
Review.Contenu: Excellent tool and use it as a guide but it is not a complete product. The temp is guiding too high and misses a lot of circumstances. Gives you a good understanding of the temp but does not work as a guide.

Review.Titre: Love that it cooked it perfectly didn’t…
Review.Contenu: Love that it cooked it perfectly didn’t like how even keeping the charging base close by with a new battery other then that it was great love it
Thermometer works great. Seems like the ambient temperature doesn't register correctly compared to the grill thermostat

Review.Titre: Great nifty tool, hardly Bluetooth compliant unfortunately
Review.Contenu: Meater is a great nifty tool, but hooking it up to your (Android) phone is quite a hassle.Too many app builders don't give Bluetooth direct access, but require connecting through their app. Also Meater does this. So you need to reset all network and Bluetooth connections, losing your watch, headphones and other gear, that want to connect through their apps, extending the chain of misery. Meater is great, but app-building is a whole different game.

I received a response from Meater after  leaving a review on here detailing items not received and no response to my enquiries. They have now explained change of courier and have promptly despatched new item - satisfied that I have now had contact but shame it has been so difficult to get information via customer services team. Good job the thermometers have rave reviews ! *Customer Experience rated not thermometer *

Review.Titre: improve the signal strength and temp…
Review.Contenu: improve the signal strength and temp calibration.

Review.Titre: Lovely and helpful support and amazing…
Review.Contenu: Lovely and helpful support and amazing customer service.

Frustrating experience - thermometer failed after two uses, contacted support and got a quick response asking more questions. Responded via an impenetrable system called pirate at apption which seems to complete ignore all responses and then sends constant messages telling you it is closing your request.Update on 27th Jan - still not resolved over a month after original problem. These are very expensive items, and maybe there is a reason their service lines are so busy?Its ticket number #124625 by the way apption labs. is this the only way to contact you?Update: actually it’s a great piece of technology when it works and after 6 weeks of back and forth with the oh so slow support dept i finally got a replacement sent out almost a week after they received my returned non-functioning one. Wish it was more robust.  Hope they can learn some lessons from all feedback and improve.

Review.Titre: Updated review - improved title and rating.
Review.Contenu: Update:Contacted Farrell who promptly discussed things internally and the solution seems to be on the horizon. And a quick one.Will further update with the review of the actual product and hopefully bump the rating further.----------------------Original review:Received cold mail from Meater and, having heard about it, decided to go for a Meater Block, and a Meater+ combo directly from their site. Gave my UK address as delivery address and it said they cannot deliver to UK country. At the time, my wife was back home in our other country and so i tried with that address. It was accepted by Meater, I paid up a bit more for postage and soon enough received info that items were dispatched. After parcel didn't arrive for more than a week, I checked tracking number only to find out:1) Parcel was not allowed to travel due to restricted goods policy2) It was being returned to sender in UKIn UK???!?!?!?! It was being sent from UK to Europe but when i tried first delivery address here in England,  it was rejected because "we do not deliver to that country"????Anyway, contacted support and 2 days later still no reply. There's nobody you can reach and, of course, like many other garbage operations, there's no phone number.Steer clear of them.

This works well. It’s important to keep it charged.  It needs more Bluetooth range though. I use it often and it is very reliable.  People love my steaks and pork loins.  The come out perfectly cooked.
Great product, you do have to tested and calibrate your readings - accurate enough with an +adjustment reading. Wish had settings for smoking meat
So easy to use.  It did disconnect a few times.  Range could be more.

MEATER works great. Just as expected. Used it about 20 times now. Makes cooking on wood bbq so easy, it almost feels like cheating. App could have more cuts of meat (or include as many of the different names for the same cut as possible). It also overheats earlier than I expected when searing at the end of a slow cook over fire. This may be unavoidable for a precision piece of kit (or maybe the warning comes on early to protect the unit). Either way, not a massive issue. Would buy again and certainly recommend to anyone reading this review.

I love my MEATER probe. Pairing and Bluetooth connectivity are never a problem and the temperature readings and cook time predictions are very accurate. My only regret is the limitations of Bluetooth connectivity radius. I do a lot of slow smokes, and if I move out of Bluetooth radius, the probe is useless. I’d like to see wifi functionality and Internet connectivity so I can monitor the cook beyond the present Bluetooth  range radius. For short smoke and grilling or oven roasts, it’s fabulous. But for a long smoke like brisket or pulled pork, battery life and Bluetooth range makes it fall short. Regarding battery life, I have to say it’s pretty impressive. It exceeds my expectations. Nevertheless for longer smoking like brisket I have to insert the probe at the end of the cook because battery life is not viable for more than about 4 to 6 hours.
I was pleasantly surprised by the accuracy and time estimates. Whole chicken internal temp and alerts left this meal exactly as I wanted it cooked. Well done!
I really enjoyed the user interface of the app and all of the data you are provided. My biggest issue is the difficulty of connecting to your phone and how hard it is to find help on-line.
Setting up was bit of a challenge due to lack of clear directions.However, once I understood the new "toy" it was absolutely awesome !
Great concept, difficult to set up initially, but once everything is synced properly, it works well.
Great way to grill!  No more guesswork with my steaks - and I’m free to do other things while they’re cooking.  Highly recommended.

I love this thing. I've ended up with a perfect cook every time except one and it was my fault for not getting the probe inserted straight. I've personally only used mine in the grill and smoker and it works every time, and I'm sure anyone should be happy with this amazing tool. The only small complaint I have is Bluetooth range on the plus. I wish I could get a little farther in the house for longer cooks. From what I understand the Block is a whole different ball game and somehow improves on an already amazing experience, and the range. If you're on the fence; take it from me, this thing is awesome.

Meat cooked great and probes definitely help keep an eye on internal Temps for food safety. My only issue is the difference in ambient temperature between the probe reading and grill thermostat reading, but on a positive will still show any temperature drop in the end.

I've been working very hard and consistently endeavoring to eat as healthy as I can. Finding it hard to eat alone and maintain portion control. So, I focus on what I can control. I'm very grateful for the Convection Oven, and MEATER Wi-Fi Temperature System, and it's my own tenacity which helps me improve my skills. Below is where I'm at today with this, and where I'm going tomorrow:    JohnThe MEATER System is a system that allows me to evaluate and improve my skills with empirical data. It's the effort and learning by trial and error that I put into improving that got me to this point. The System could improve, and I think the MEATER development team is working on it, but it's the best System I found, and believe I wouldn't reach my current skill level without it. Thank you MEATER System Team. Enjoy and share the fruit of my labor. Filet Mignon 1 3/4"×5" seasoned overnight wrapped: sumac, smoked paprika, garlic, onion, black cherry, with KCl rubbed in. Cooked butter topped in small aluminum rectangular baking pan, modified with wedge cut out to within 1/2" of pan bottom, to accommodate MEATER System probe's unincumbered access to reading meats internal/ambient temperatures, and at the same time contain migrating cooking liquids. Then nested baking pan on a silicone pad covered baking tray to maximize even indirect heating of meat. Slow low temperature cooked to medium well: 160°F internal in Convection Oven set at 222°F ambient temperature (about an hour cook time) this method rendered most of the outer fat out of the meat and maintained the integrity of the fats & lipids intercellularly. Delicious, tender (because of the cut of meat), melt in your mouth, a healthy and flavorful protein. Now that I got this down, time to apply this method to my smoker pallet grill when it arrives.       John J 10/29/2023

I would give a 5+ based on the experience that I had with “Chris” from customer support. He was professional. Got to the root of my concern and truly went above and beyond what was necessary to ensure I was satisfied with the product. The only reason I gave a 4 was because I had to go through an I.A. Bot to get to an actual customer service representative. As far as an actual product review. I may have just been unlucky with my first purchase. The MEATER+ that it was replaced with is a fantastic product in which I highly recommend. This is a great product and even more importantly has an outstanding customer service team that stands behind it.

Review.Titre: If it broke, I’d buy a second one.
Review.Contenu: This particular cook was spot on. I’ve had some temp accuracy issues with previous cooks but this one was absolutely perfect. If it broke I’d buy another just bc it’s more accurate than any instant reads that I own. The temp remained within 1-2 degrees of the probe that came with the Traeger Ironwood 885 so I feel I may have the accuracy deal figured out. I hope. Docked 1 star for the prior cooks not being consistent in my opinion but could’ve also been operator error. Time will tell.

Review.Titre: Best Digital, Wireless Thermometer I've Used
Review.Contenu: A TRUE wireless.  Easy to use and the accuracy is spot on.  The wireless/bluetooth range appears unstable many times and often drops.  I have a mesh system, so coverage is strong everywhere.  Trying to use it outside on our deck, and inside a smoker is futile.  I love it and trust it.

Love the Meater Thermometer and the app overall! I’ll admit it’s a little kitch-y, but it really works where it counts. It makes the whole process easy… From setting up the cook, to monitoring the cook and adding alarms, and ultimately finishing the cookout an expected time and near-perfect doneness. Great device, and great app!

Review.Titre: Great for burger a pain for steaks.
Review.Contenu: I always found it hard to cook homemade burger's. Typically they would just be over cooked or to pink for my liking. Using the meater makes it easy to get the temperature I like. When cooking steaks I don’t use the meater. I cook my steaks at a very high temperature and the meater gives me warnings about the heat. I find it much easier to go by touch and insta read thermometer

Review.Titre: Fantastic product though mine seems to…
Review.Contenu: Fantastic product though mine seems to slightly under cook for my taste so I always go one up ie if you like medium rare I find medium is closer. Prob just my probe needing calibrating.

Update August 8 2023:Issue with the gloves was resolved, they sent and I received a new pair. You can't ask for better service than that. Thanks Meater!The Meater Probe works great, connection was fast and never lost, everything was spot on with that. However, I bought the package that came with the Meater+ probe and BBQ mitts that are supposed to be heat resistant to 525*F; I was using the rotisserie at 400*F and burnt my thumb taking it off. I'm going to be very cautious if I decide to use them again.

They will spam you like crazy! After downloading their app they started sending me commercial ads via email every other day or so. I have tried unsubscribing six times to no avail. I guess I am stuck now with receiving their ads every other day forever … This behavior is not ok :-( Nice thermometer though, so two stars and not one..Dec 17 2022: Orig reviewJan 6 2023: Response from Meater on Trustpilot. I am not receiving spam anymore. Review upgraded to four stars - I still think the product is super

Review.Titre: Very Nicely made little tool that works…
Review.Contenu: Very Nicely made little tool that works well. You just need to cook enough to be able to appreciate it.In my situation it might become a learning experience everytime I use it, but hopefully not. (I don't cook a lot).I would have to say it helped me cook 6 ribeyes to everyone's delight. Without this little tool I would have probably overcooked them all.

Review.Titre: The ease of use and information…
Review.Contenu: The ease of use and information provided by this thermometer is outstanding. Quality of construction is top notch, and the Meater block looks great on the counter. What I find to be most useful is its ability to give me time remaining on what I am grilling/smoking/baking so that I have an accurate finish time to start side dishes. And of course let the family know when we will be eating.I give it 4/5 stars only because of the size of the probes. They are significantly larger then most meat probes which I feel does limit you on some of the meats it could be used in.

The Meater probes allow for a good cook.  I am just confused as to which probe to go by, as each of the two probes showed different templates.  Over a 25 plus minute cook I took 10 samples and I averaged 5.6° internal and 14.9° ambient.  So like I said which probe to go by a Max of 9° internal and 28° ambient and a Min of 1° internal and 5° ambient.   What a temperature difference and no way to calibrate the readings to match.

Review.Titre: Learning a new way to cook
Review.Contenu: I started cooking a chicken breast at medium high heat which seared the outside. Turned the heat down 50% and continued cooking. Breast was hard cooked on the outside but soft and moist inside. I love my Meater. Every mistake I made is my fault, but the Meater has saved my dinners each time
Result was good, tasty, and juicy.I should try it with Bluefish filet in later October.Seasoning with only seasalt before puting in oven

Review.Titre: Everything that I've cooked so far, chicken and tuna steak was good
Review.Contenu: Received Meater as a gift but I am surprised how easy and fun it is to use. Everything that I've cooked so far, chicken breast and tuna steak comes out exactly to the settings! Not five stars just because sometimes it disconnects, i.e. if you go back inside the house but it's also expected.

Review.Titre: Long rest time.  I guess perfection takes it time.
Review.Contenu: Strange how long the rest time was on this spinela Dorsi piece of meat. But it was properly cooked and everyone enjoyed

Review.Titre: The Meater as easy as it comes!!
Review.Contenu: The Meater is by far the BEST wireless thermometer on the market. It’s ease of using your smartphone is pure genius completely removes all doubt when baking or grilling or smoking your preferred item.

The setup of using the product is very simple, especially as the app has instructional reminders built in to every step. I would like to see one improvement made to the connectivity options. Currently only via Bluetooth, but adding wifi would greatly enhance the the experience.

1. Too much notifications on iPhone towards end of grilling/cooking.2. AppleWatch-App should work standalone without first connecting MEATER to the iPhone/iPad… Would really be helpful in larger gardens or appartement with separated balconies…
The Meater + works very well. I am thinking that the probe ambient temperature is more accurate than the one built into the grill. Meater was easy to pair with the app. A nice little device.
I find the MEATER a very helpful tool, as I am a beginner in slow cooking/ smoking on my Kamado style grill. Even as I gain experience,, is nice to see and monitor progress, especially remotely.

Review.Titre: Works well but connection lost due to short distance
Review.Contenu: It does give you an accurate sense of temperature; however, it doesn't take into account resting temperature.  I will set the temperature higher next time; however, it is very accurate.  I did lose connection and had to bring my phone closer to the grill which defeated the purpose of cooking in the kitchen and keeping an eye on the grill.  But steak came out perfect!

I could tell from the probes where NY hotspots were and how to balance the meat to the most efficient spot. I would like to see the Base have a charger indicator, when charging you have no idea if it is charging or not.

Review.Titre: Useful tool with wide range of methods…
Review.Contenu: Useful tool with wide range of methods to prepare your meat. Connection not always 100% and suggestion for improvement would be to make it possible the the base station doesn’t have to be near the bbq while use the MEATER

Love my meater, but it's a hit or miss getting it to connect to my phone. It sits there forever trying to connect and it doesn't. Tried also using a different phone to see if it works on that one but still didn't. It didn't need any updates or anything it just for some reason not working. But i love it and will buy another one soon.

Review.Titre: There was a bit of a learning curve in…
Review.Contenu: There was a bit of a learning curve in the way I usually baked the chicken. But it turned out perfect on our first try! The only downside is that I couldn't directly monitor it from my livingroom 15 feet away.
This is a quality product that works as well as it looks, I like being able to see my ambient temp fluctuations on a graph as I monitor my cook. Would definitely recommend this to everyone who cooks
Great how the meater provides temperature readings of both grill and internal meat temp. Estimated cooking time was accurate too. Probe needs to be smaller for smaller cuts of meat.

We like the concept. We looked at Meater for some time before buying the block. First attempts not perfect but that's just a matter of getting used to the preselected settings. Overall, we like it. Not cheap but if it gives us perfectly cooked food for years to come, it's a good investment

Review.Titre: The thermometer block is a great…
Review.Contenu: The thermometer block is a great product, I've done many cooks with them and generally I have a great experience. My only complaint would be that somtimes the cook drops from the cloud and it drops from the log, but it has happened only a handful of time from over 100 cooks so far.

I have been trying to contact Meater customer service by phone for the past 2-days. Each time I am stuck listening to music for up to 30+ minutes, no one takes the call, and I just hang up.  Can someone from Meater please contact  me regarding a replacement probe. Joseph Brown 609-206-5391I am not sure who from MEATER replied, but their reply is incorrect. Upon a 3rd attempt I was able to reach Meater's customer service. The gentleman who assisted me was very understanding and apologetic. He resolved my issue and gave me a 50% discount on a replacement probe order. I was very satisfied 😌 Meater customer service number is (818) 929-8907 and you need to press #3 when prompted. I have update my rating from a 1 to a 4 because the overall outcome was extremely satisfying. Thank you Meater.
When it works, the results are right on target. The trick is to make the Internet connection work outside at the grill.

Review.Titre: 2nd time I used it and still learning
Review.Contenu: 2nd time I used it and still learning.  My steaks came out anemic and bleeding because I never seared them first  ( or after)  They were cooked through perfectly though.  They don't look too good but taste great.

It's a great device. My first time using it on pork chops I may have made a mistake because they were reading 19°f above the meater internal temp. I have since used it in a rib roast and some tomahawk steaks. It has performed perfectly!! This is a must have for Me and if it keeps performing like this I will certainly be buying the upgraded set.
Very easy to use - however your phone has to be pretty close to the probe otherwise connection is lost to the BT.The instruction given on the app is very accurate.

Review.Titre: My Meater is GREAT when it works
Review.Contenu: My Meater is GREAT when it works. My 1st Meater was a Father's Day gift. I liked it so much that I purchased another one. About 6 months ago one just quit working now the other appears to be on out as it will not hold a charge... I don't keep good records on purchases like this, so I'll just move on...

Firstly, I am very impressed with the functionality of the Meater+. The system works well, and I love that I can accurately monitor my cooks on my Kamado grill for low and slow cooking.Unfortunately, after six cooks, my probe malfunctioned and stopped working altogether. After contacting their customer service, I received a reply via a helpful chap called Kavan, who guided me through a check-list. After ascertaining the probe was defective, a replacement was dispatched and received within a week.I can see that a number of customers are incredibly negative about their service levels, although I have not found this to be the case. Quite the opposite. Clearly they are upping their game as they grow.
Excellent product when correctly inserted. Easy to cook meat/fish exactly to taste. App can lose the ETA when phone screen goes off, but reconnects fairly quickly. Overall very, very good.

Review.Titre: Disappointing start so not quite 5 stars
Review.Contenu: When I first got my Meater I charged it in the charging block. However, when I first came to use it the battery (supplied) was flat and had leaked. I cleaned it up and put in a new battery. Used it a couple of times since and everything has come out perfectly. Found that if I cover my joint in foil I need to leave the probe sticking out or it loses connection

Review.Titre: The app was a little confusing when…
Review.Contenu: The app was a little confusing when starting to cook but I had four perfect steaks using the meater in just one of them.  Definitely my go to thermometer from now on

PROS The thermometer works great! Never over or under cook your meat again.  Easy to use app.CONS even when using the docking station  signal distance while inside the house is not strong.  Can't run it and leave my phone in the house.
The only small problem I have is when grilling a piece of meat that requires turning a timer would be helpful so as NOT to get it too done on one side.
My meats are never over cooked now and I really like that it estimates how long it will be until my cook finished based on real time temperatures.

Review.Titre: Only Thing I don't like about Meater Is…
Review.Contenu: Only Thing I don't like about Meater Is the distance is to short.   It advertised to go 165 feet But in reality when you go into the house it loses connection at 35 feet.  Very frustrating.

Review.Titre: Great thermometer. Should recharge instead of old school battery.
Review.Contenu: Extremely accurate. Have to stay relatively close in my house to the thermometer. Overall distance is pretty good. Finally would rather charge with a cord.
Straightforward to use, some challenges with connectivity but once these were sorted we were fine. Really good food and well designed app.

The Meater is a great product.  Every time I use it I get perfect results, no kidding.  I love the product and will continue to use it periodically and recommen it to friends.  It is very simple to use and give accurate results!  M
Works like a charm with thicker cuts of steak and chicken, but tends to overheat with meats less than around 3/4 inch thick. Good app interface.
I loved the fact that I can monitor my cooking without opening having to open my BGE loosing the heat.Precise temperature monitoring ensures your food is cooked to a precise doneness

I have a meater and a meater+.  When using the Meater+ I almost never have a connection issue but when I try to use both Meater and Meater+ I almost always have connection issues even if I am standing next to block and probe.

Product is good but uneven. I am not sure if I have a defect product. 80% of the time it turns out perfect, the remaining time, the tempeture spikes by over 10C in the matter of seconds, and the meat ends up overcooked

Review.Contenu: I was about to give up on it for connectivity issues but I finally figured it out and my reverse sear of a rib-eye was almost perfect.

Easy to set up with my phone, connected right away. Tried it out on Traeger Pro 34 Smoker cooking chicken legs and even alerts when to take meat off grill. So far so good!

Review.Titre: Easy to set up and reliable device
Review.Contenu: Easy to set up with specific items and even cuts of meat. Estimates for time until done makes it easy to work out timing on side dishes.

Review.Titre: I found it a little fidderly to set up
Review.Contenu: I found it a little fidderly to set up, but once it was it works a treat. I run it through my iPad as it seems more stable than the mobile. Good bit of kit and rate it much higher than other probes sold by Weber. I bought the quad which in my opinion offers value for money.

And it turned out a little chewy but sooo good. Next time 225 for much longer. I have heard of the “stall” but it was amazing to actually witness it, cool. I lost connection with unit over 50 feetOnly time will tell, but so far its got my vote. William

Review.Contenu: Helped me monitor the meat temp. Just make sure you have the receiver close to the thermometer or you will loose connectivity
