Great app - easy to use and good recipes and recommendations!4/5 as the connection to the probe at times is unstable.
Having some issues with connection but the temp of food is perfect every time. Cooks the best steaks we have ever had.
It was pretty easy to set up. It disconnected from my phone a few times, but I think that was due to inactivity. And it reconnected pretty quickly. Overall, it worked like a charm.

Review.Titre: Great devise for the perfect steak …
Review.Contenu: Great devise for the perfect steak…. Only issue was connectivity pass 6 feet.

Review.Titre: The meater is great, App not so much
Review.Contenu: The meater is a great thermometer because of its long lasting battery and surprisingly good Bluetooth. Sadly the pre set cooks in the App can never be trusted to 100%. For example on a quick steak this thermometer is close to useless. Calculated cook time is inaccurate and when to remove from heat is well off to reach your goal. Low and slow cooks work fairly well, again with a learning curve from the user. The remove from heat warning is way to early. If I’d use the notification for my brisket I would always end up 5 degrees below my goal. And 5 minutes of resting for a 17 lb brisket!? Maybe the cooks in the app will improve. The device itself works phenomenal and I can’t complain. Well worth the money if you know what kind of temps you’re looking for and take the app suggestions with a grain of salt.Edit:My experience with the steaks came from making a ribeye steak. I set a target of 125°, fired up the grill and threw the steak on. I flipped it once at around 90° and by the time the app told me to „remove from heat“ the steak was overshooting the target and ended up at 137° when done resting. It did work for me, when reverse searing and not using the meater at the end of the grill. So far I just ignore the estimated times because during low and slow cooks, they sometimes show 23 hours remaining. Even with me changing nothing about the setup (grill stays closed with set temperature), the cook takes about 12-13 hours. And while grilling a steak, by the time the app shows an estimated time, it’s telling you to „remove from heat“. I think this might be due to measuring ambient temperature but not the grate temp from the direkt fire.
Grwat probe. Produced Great moist chicken. Would be nice for an oven temperature only probe  and a thinner probe for fish etc.
Loved the wireless feature.  Also found the app to be very helpful for our first time using our smoker.

Review.Titre: Works great but the block and the phone…

Once I Had my 50 year old son help me set it up (I'm 77) it work get. If they had a pamphlet available in stead of the app it may have been easier for me to follow

Review.Titre: MEATER was bang on with the temp of my…
Review.Contenu: MEATER was bang on with the temp of my Roast Pork leg. Easy to use I actually don’t know why anyone would have one.
Thermometer was impressive, everything I hoped for.  But I need more practice on cooking a good Brisket.
With meater, I never overcook anything!Meater is so easy to set up on iPhone

My chicken turned out perfect. Succulent. No more overcooked chicken breast.

Review.Titre: Really useful cooking aid - Buy one
Review.Contenu: Used to check & cook a topside of beef (small) but not yet cut/eaten This device is great for checking the temperature of the meat in the middle of the joint. So glad I bought one. Easy to use and seems accurate for temperature. Recommend this device for any cooking where it’s great to know the inside.
Im really good with cooking timings but Meter means you have less to think about and store in your head you can trust that you’ll get a reminder when to take out your meat. Always Perfection ❤️

Review.Contenu: Cooked a tenderloin Roast last nigh and only used the MEATER for temperature and time, it turned out perfectly. i did check the temperature with my therma pen and it was the same as the MEATER.

This is awesome wireless/ Bluetooth thermometer. I cooked a 11. 5 Boston Butt, it took about 23 hours to smoke. I had to work a 10 hour shift and sleep. I was able to know how my meat was cooking and I did not have to stay at home. I should have brought this a long time ago.
Works great!  I want to get a multi pack so I can know the temp at different places on a 20lb prime rib.On the ends vs the middle.  Great product, high quality, easy to use.
Greatest kitchen gadget!This is useful and has never failed to grill/roast/bake a variety of meats perfectly.

So easy to use and very precise. Much easier to use than wired meters. I love these probes having the meat temp & the ambient temp on each one. The information reported from the monitor to my iPhone is wonderful and allows lots of data for your cook!

Review.Titre: Really like the way it charts progress…
Review.Contenu: Really like the way it charts progress during the cooking process, it is really easy to use and the app walks you thru step by step. My only complaint is I wish the connection between the phone and meater were a little stronger.

Review.Titre: Reverse searing a quality prime rib eye…
Review.Contenu: Reverse searing a quality prime rib eye produces a steak the your friends will asking all the right questions afterwards! D Lish

Review.Titre: Smoked Brisket on Big Green Egg
Review.Contenu: Readings from my Meater Plus 2 were identical with the readings from my Flameboss controller. Never hurts to have two inputs as a crosscheck. Alarms when you reach meat temperature - in this case 195 degrees farenheit. I double checked with aninstaread probe and temperature agreed. Probe also used to test tenderness. Once off the smoker left Meater in while meat rested until it reached170 degrees.Then wrapped and held at 150 degrees in electric smoker until time to serve.

Review.Titre: Loved using the Meater+ for roasting a…
Review.Contenu: Loved using the Meater+ for roasting a turkey…no more opening the oven to check the temperature nor even having to go to the kitchen as the progress is shown on the app. The alert tones were helpful and once the app gave an estimated cook time, it turned out to be fairly accurate. Wonderful feature for planning the preparation of other meal items so all are ready to eat at the same time as long as you take into account the “rest” time after cooking. Very easy to use, convenient and cleans up easy.

What an absolutely amazing product. Previously had zero idea on how to cook, especially meats. Also didn’t realise how important resting is. This does all of that, and love setting custom alarms to help time other things like vegetables so that they’re done at the same time as the meat. Definitely gonna buy more meater products like the big block with multiple probes.

A YouTuber I watch recommended the Meater so I bought one to try out to cook a Thanksgiving turkey. It was easy to set up. The only flaw was that the estimated time to cook on the app first said 7 hours but then lowered the amount of time and ended up taking 5 hours including resting time at the end. The turkey cooked perfectly though at the right temperature and tasted delicious. I like that it took the guesswork out of cooking meat. I’ll definitely use mine again and I’m glad I had it to help with my Thanksgiving dinner.

The ability to put a prime rib in my smoker and not worry about over or under cooking it and let MEATER do the rest. Is priceless  it actually notifies you just before the cooking process is done thru the app on your phone. I highly recommend this product for everyone who likes their meats perfect every time

Review.Titre: Great little thermometer… worked like a…
Review.Contenu: Great little thermometer… worked like a charm on a chuck eye cast iron skillet cook! Awesome!

Review.Titre: I bought this for cooking a…turkey
Review.Contenu: I bought this for cooking a thanksgiving turkey. I was a little bit nervous because  I was taking the chance with this product for the first time with this Thanksgiving meal. I was skeptical because the thermometer advised the turkey was done much quicker than I anticipated. I decided to trust it. I can honestly say I wish I had this 20 years ago because this is the first time I have made a turkey that didn’t end up dry! It was perfectly cooked. Hats off! I’m a believer.  I highly recommend this product!

Purchased just the single probe.Initially a few Bluetooth connection issues...however, seems to be fine now.Getting perfect results each time now.Tried BBQ chicken, Scotch filet, Sirloin and Burgers.All perfect! Recommended

This is one of the best purchase I've ever made. My roast turned out juicy and why didn't I buy this earlier! I chose this over wired thermometer, because of the many good reviews from YouTube/Internet. The app is user-friendly, interface is great, plenty of live data while the meat is roasting. Love it! Highly recommended.

Review.Titre: I have loved the MEATER thermometer…
Review.Contenu: I have loved the MEATER thermometer since day one.  It allows me to cook steaks, burgers and everything else to perfection (except the rare few occasions I second guessed it and undercooked a few things).  I will never second guess it again!   The only time I had an issue was when pan frying pork chops, so wouldn't recommend using it in frying pan applications.

Review.Titre: It’s an amazing bit of kit
Review.Contenu: It’s an amazing bit of kit.   Whatever your preference, it makes you realise we are all overcooking our meat.  For the price, an absolutely remarkable piece of kit.
I stinking love this thing.  I get all nervous cooking because the family likes their food different from me.  Over-done burger, pulled it off too early.... this just takes the guess work out.

Review.Titre: This thing is the Bee’s knees
Review.Contenu: This thing is the Bee’s knees! Cooking is already easy with a good thermometer but the convenience and the versatility of the Meater+ is unmatched. Syncing the thermometer with your phone allows a completely stress-free cooking experience.

Review.Titre: Home cook no longer scared of meat cuts
Review.Contenu: Love cooking but always strayed away from larger cuts because I was always overcooking or undercooking and timers seemed to hurt more than help. This nifty little gadget works great and gives me something a lot more reliable. Have done 2 different pork cuts and can’t wait to move on to steak!

Review.Titre: Grilling made easy!,So far I’ve used this for chicken
Review.Contenu: So far I’ve used this for chicken, beef and pork . Whether gril, in the oven or even in an air fryer, every single time it is cooked to perfection.

Review.Titre: Best way to beat dry meat.
Review.Contenu: I've used my Meater 2, 3 times so far. My meat was cooked perfectly all 3 times. My guests at Thanksgiving said it was the juiciest turkey of their lives. I am in love with meater 2 and will be recommending it and purchasing at least 1 for a gift. Get your meat on now.

Works as advertised.  Have only used it twice, but the results were great.  The best probe I have ever used.   And the App is fantastic.  I plan on using it for Thanksgiving with the Turkey.  It's important to view all the videos that come with the App.  The Meater can do so much more than measure the internal temperature.    I will use it often.

It’s always so difficult to know when a pork chop or piece of meat is cooked to perfection. With the MEATER it takes away the guess work and you are always guaranteed perfectly cooked meat. It’s amazing!

Review.Titre: The MEATER is a game changer.
Review.Contenu: The MEATER is a game changer.The wireless probe would be enough to make this device awesome, but the app is actually well written, easy to use, and does a good job of helping to predict when the cook will be ready.I've used several other wireless* (the probes weren't wireless, but wireless readout devices or phone connections) devices.  For those without a phone connection, they do okay, but you have another device to deal with.  For those that had phone connectivity, usually the app is a bit of a mess.  MEATER's app is pretty solid.  There's room for improvement in the UI, but it is leaps and bounds ahead of the competition.  Easy to use, guides you through cook setup, and the predictive capabilities are pretty good - not always precise, but it beats trying to figure it out yourself.

Review.Titre: The MEATER is a fantastic tool!
Review.Contenu: The MEATER is a fantastic tool! Everything we have cooked with it has come out perfectly cooked and juicier than ever. The app is simple to use, and it's quick and easy to set up a cook. Only takes a few seconds to be ready to go. I'll never go without one again.

Review.Titre: I use my meater a lot
Review.Contenu: I use my meater a lot. My last cook was some steaks. I reduced the recommended temp to 129 degrees and followed the directions in the app. The cook was excellent - seared on the outside and pink on the inside. Perfect!

Review.Titre: Perfect results everytime great help for colour blindness
Review.Contenu: My son purchased a meater as he is colour blind.  It assists him to know when his meat is cooked.  He purchased two as there was an offer, he gave the 2nd one to me for Xmas. What a fantastic gift, perfect results every time, in particular, steak is spot on! Cannot recommend highly enough! I wouldn’t be without it!

Review.Titre: Use the MEATER thermometer for first…
Review.Contenu: Use the MEATER thermometer for first time and really easy to use with perfect cooking!! Love this gadget

I was cooking a 7 pound rib roast at 225° and it was accurate this time within a few minutes. A wonderful product to have.

Review.Titre: I can Check temps remotely - time saver for butchershop
Review.Contenu: Very good product have used for about 4 years in my commercial smoker for my Butcher Shop to produce hams cabanossi  bacon and also for roasting meat for parties-particularly like that I can link to the cloud and check temperatures remotely A1 product

Review.Titre: My son gave me a MEATER for Xmas after…

Since then I always use the MEATER for roasting roasts or whole poultry without having to monitor and open the oven and it comes out perfectly cooked the way I want.  I love my MEATER.

The best in town.Cooking made easy with the app which guides you trough the experience. Even if something isn´t represented you can create it and adjust different parameters just as you wish.I love it and recommend it to anybody who likes cooking.

Review.Titre: The Meater is a game changer!!
Review.Contenu: The Meater is a game changer!!! Easy to use, Works perfect!! The information while grilling is amazing, the app allows you to focus on other important things - Like The Football Game and still be a grill-master. I'm upgrading to the Meater Block for big family days.

Review.Titre: Meat is perfectly cooked using meater as a guide.

Review.Titre: So nice to have accurate temp.

Everything we have used the Meater Plus on has been perfectly cooked. I started with grilling some super thick chicken breasts. My husband bought the Meater Plus as we had just gotten the new grill to downsize and I really wanted to sharpen my skills since I never touched "his baby" as he was/IS the grill master LOLHe was sure the meat was going to be dry as dust but to his surprise- the meat was perfect and juicy! EVERYthing has worked that way with the Meater Plus!We have mostly use it in our new Little Akorn grill but have also used it in our NuWave Bravo toaster oven.Most important thing you can remember is to keep the square end clean! That's how it communicates the info. (I had to look up that info with by browser search!)

My husband is usually the one in charge of cooking/grilling/roasting. I used this for the first time and my roast came out absolutely perfect! I impressed my husband and father-in-law! I tried it a second time weeks later and once again it did not fail to impress. We absolutely LOVE Meater. I will not cook/roast without it!

Review.Titre: Meater makes a great heat probe and the…

The MEATER device was very helpful for this first attempt at smoking a whole turkey. Love the technology.
The Meater was easy to set up, it connects to the app reliably, and I love using it for high-temp cooks. Great product!
Perfect Roast, The roast come out perfectly. While i was busy entertaining guests I was able to focus on time with them rather than checking on the cooking time and the readiness of the roast.

Review.Titre: This is the perfect item for anybody

With precision measurement, splendid and elegant packaging and a truly excellent and functional application... You can relax during your barbecues, he will take care of everything.  Highly recommended for anyone looking for perfection.
Meater is great perfect roasts evertime. Chicken that is never dry. Beef cooked just the way we like.

Review.Titre: Easy to use and temperature was perfect…
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and temperature was perfect on the pull and rest temp. Beef round came out cooked to perfection thanks to MEATER and seeing what was going on.
Love this thermometer! I’ve had it for two+ years and it’s still working great. It has never let me down.

Review.Titre: I find the MEATER to be easy, accurate and reliable
Review.Contenu: I find the MEATER to be easy, reliable and accurate. No cord attachments to get in the way of other items or food being cooked. The MEATER provides accurate information directly to my smartphone about the temperature of the cook and best of all the TIMING of the cook which helps in coordinating the preparation of the other accompanying items of the meal.  The MEATER helps to ensure the item I am cooking achieves the desired level of “doneness.”
Used for the first time today cooking roast beef in my very old, temperamental Aga. Our beef was perfect. first time ever in this cooker. Christmas is back on!
Used my MEATER to track the progress of my Thanksgiving turkey. The bird came out perfectly done. Love this product.

Review.Titre: Easy to use and very accurate great…
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and very accurate great device. Aleays had A perfect result With different kind of meat. Highly recommended!

Tonight I cooked steak and chicken for 15 people, I used one prob for the chicken  and one for the the steak I usss a smoker with indirect heat and everything was cooked perfect! It never would have turned out if I hadn’t used my Meater!

Review.Titre: Never thought I would need this bit of…
Review.Contenu: Never thought I would need this bit of kit but felt I need to try it as my daughter bought it for me as a gift. I love the accuracy it provides on various heats of BBQ. Love using it!
Thanksgiving turkey was perfect.  Breast was 165.  Dark meat was 179.  12 pound turkey done in two hours.

Used the probe to keep track of the temp while smoking a briaket overnight and it was pretty nice.  The app was easy to use and get the probe set up.  There was about 5 to 10 second instructional videos each step to set it up.  Overall I really liked this product so far, it is a bit pricey but it's simple to use.  Well see how long it lasts as time goes on.
Cooked the Venison Back strap wrapped in bacon to perfection. So delicious. Love the Meater.
This is buy far the best thermometer I've owned with the app make it so easy to cook amazing meat, would highly recommend 👌

Review.Titre: Worked like an old school fireman

Review.Contenu: I love my MEATER! I have it set up on my iPad.   I put the iPad on the counter and can focus on other aspects of the meal without having to run outside constantly to check smoker and internal temps.

Review.Titre: Never lose heat opening the door again
Review.Contenu: It is fantastic to have a completely wireless terminator. I never have to open a door because I know what the internal temperature AND the ambient temp is.

Review.Titre: Meater is not just for meat!
Review.Contenu: I've used the Meater as advertised, i.e. for meat, and it has been great. Perfect roast beef and chicken.Today, I went a bit off piste and used it to judge when my baked potatoes were ready, i.e. not meat! Set the target temperature to 93° and put the probe into the largest of 4 large potatoes and put them in my air fryer. 1 hour later my phone told me they were ready and it was correct - they were perfect 😁
I have been baking and cooking for over 50 years.  The meater is accurate and easy to use.  Meat comes out tender, juicy and delicious.  This is one of the best gifts my husband ever gave me!

Review.Titre: Great Combination of Product and App
Review.Contenu: Made Spatchcock chicken on Big Green Egg using Meater and it was done perfectly.  This was one of the first times using Meater and it lived up to the marketing 110%!

Review.Titre: Meater plus works exactly as intended…
Review.Contenu: Meater plus works exactly as intended and makes it very easy to get excellent results.  Very solid software with good cooking guidelines, helpful notifications and very easy to track progress as the cook progresses.
Love the ambient temp .I have a Pit Boss vertical. It's about 20 degrees off.Don't care cause this Meater is spot on.
Really helped with managing bbq temperature and with meat internal temp. Notifications helpful also as the cook was over 6 hours and I am very forgetful.

Used for the first time w bone in skin on chicken thighs! Baked in oven on baking sheet at 425 with the rack on top of the baking sheet and the skin got crispy, everything cooked so evenly. Seriously fool proof!
I have so many thermometers for grilling/smoking. Most are pretty complicated. My Meater+ is user friendly and accurate. It’s the only one I use now. Btw, their app is kinda perfect! Kudos to you!
Easy to use, good instructions through the app and good online help

I was dubious but MEATER is a marvellous device for accurately cooking meat.  My roast chicken was cooked to perfection.  I would definitely recommend everyone gets one for safety and excellence in their cooking
